plot: The story of how the dead and nature, particularly elephants, have brought the human and natural communities together for peacemaking and reconciliation.
title: The Dead Will Guide Us: Teachings from Liberia's Civil War
plot_es: The story of how the dead and nature, particularly elephants, have brought the human and natural communities together for peacemaking and reconciliation.
original_name: The Dead Will Guide Us: Teachings from Liberia's Civil War
plot_en: The story of how the dead and nature, particularly elephants, have brought the human and natural communities together for peacemaking and reconciliation.
